Reviews.Title: Great Item as long as the receiver can see the transmitter
Reviews.Author: JHorton "In God We Trust"
Reviews.Content: The convenience of installing it anywhere in the house is great, but I notice that sometimes if it is not looking the receiver and the transmitter, it shows some interference.I made sure that the receivers are in one side of the house opposite to the wireless router to avoid interference.But the quality of the video and audio when the signal shows is great...

ProductInfo.Features:
Watch your home, baby or business anywhere, record on phone or PC
No hidden cost, doesn't need registration or create an account, no monthly fee
Easy setup, no port forwarding or DDNS needed, secure peer to peer connection
1/4" CMOS sensor f6.0mm lens auto day night IR Cut
Free PIXPO iPhone Android Phone Apps Free PC Viewer
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu WiFi Mobile Surveillance IP Camera Baby Monitor for Home or Business Remote View Audio Video Day Night Pan Tilt Wireless WO4
